edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.game.subject.impl

Enum GameUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GameUtility>
      • edu.nyu.cs.connectfour.game.subject.impl.GameUtility
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameStatusSubject, Serializable, Comparable<GameUtility>

    public enum GameUtility
extends Enum<GameUtility>
implements GameStatusSubject
    Author:
    shenli

    An GameUtility object is used to record game information, including game mode, computer level, offensive player, which player is turn, and game status.

    The singleton GameUtility object is thread-safe.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      INSTANCE
      The singleton instance contains all the game status information

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Return string representation of this singleton GameUtility object. The string representation consists of the game mode, computer level, offensive player, turn player, playing flag and game over flag separated by '/' character.

        Overrides:
        toString in class Enum<GameUtility>
        Returns:
